input.sentences: at the conference | we encountered an extremely enthusiastic young man who could n't resist hamming it up for our camera .
however | most of the speakers were far more subdued .
and the presentations were a bit dry | though not without some humor .
and we each got our own dinosaur figurine as a freebie from one of the booths .
most of us could n't leave without taking some group pictures to show off to our colleagues later .
output.sentences: Everyone agreed Chris was a jerk when he tried to dab.
A professor stood on the stage and ridiculed him for cultural appropriation.
The professor even had a presentation about Chris and cultural appropriation.
Later on, Sasha arrived at the science fair with her own presentation about dinosaurs.
But in the end, all anyone cared about was how Jack left with the two prettiest women—Julie and Jessica.
